$$
Ey_v = \sum_{u:(v,u) |in E} \ell_{vu} \sum_{p:(v,u)\in p} \theta_p

---

![](img/region_graph.png)

- Penalized method of moments:
  - #parameters = #paths through graph
  - sparsity inducing penalty to obtain solution with small # of patterns
  
$$
\min_{\theta_p} \sum_v |y_v - \sum_{u:(v,u)\in E} \ell_{vu} \sum_{p:(v,u)\in p} \theta_p | + \lambda \sum_p |\theta_p |
$$
